[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/heaps](./heaps.md) &gt; [Heap](./heaps.heap.md)

## Heap class

Generic binary heap / priority queue with customizable ordering via user-supplied comparator. By default, implements min-heap ordering and uses @<!-- -->thi.ng/compare.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Heap<T> implements Iterable<T>, IClear, ICopy<Heap<T>>, IEmpty<Heap<T>>, ILength, IStack<T, T, Heap<T>> 
```

## Example


```ts
h = new Heap([20, 5, 10]);
h.push(15);

h.pop(); // 5
h.pop(); // 10
h.pop(); // 15
h.pop(); // 20
h.pop(); // undefined

```
